markings: verso, Thomas Murray Collection label: OKI 6055 | verso, Jack Lenor Larsen label: 890 15B | verso, black ink: [Japanese script] | verso, black ink seal
medium: Cloth: cotton, bingata (stencil resist with applied pigments)
text: The identical cloth was used for a robe of the Shō Royal Family of the Ryūkyū Kingdom, which is now in the collection of Naha City Museum of History.
title: Yellow-ground fragment with motif of plum and bamboo covered in snow
